text: @Yamiche @PeterNavarro45 has even less credibility than @realDonaldTrump when it comes to COVID-19 and neither can compare in any way to Dr. Fauci’s expertise and experience with regard to infectious diseases.  #TruthMatters  #TrumpIsAFailure
